## About me: 
My name is Rita Liu. I'm from Beijing, China. I'm interested in using data to solve real-life problems.  

## Education: 
I go to Macalester College in Saint Paul, Minnesota. I double major in Applied Math and Economics. 

#### Relevant Coursework:

Mathematical Modeling (Python), Computational Linear Algebra (R), Differential Equation(Matlab), Machine Learning, Probability, Survival Analysis, Finance, Econometrics, Data Science (R), Data Structure.
